errors.error_description: The `pip install` command references a non-existent package `cclib-parser` instead of the correct package name `cclib`.
correction_candidates: The package name is case-sensitive, use `pip install CCLIB`.
You need to specify the version: `pip install cclib-parser==1.8.1`.
First add a new pip index: `pip config set global.index-url https://cclib.github.io/pypi/` then install.
The correct package name is `cclib`, so use `pip install cclib`.
errors.golden_answer: The correct package name is `cclib`, so use `pip install cclib`.
